# Data Load
```{r}
setwd("/Users/kamei/Research/techdebt/msr16_td_interest/")
source("./r_scripts/data_read-non-SATD.r")
data.s1.non_SATD <- data.s1[(data.s1[, "CountInput_v1"] != -1), ]
data.s1_s2.non_SATD <- data.s1[(data.s1[, "CountInput_v1"] != -1 & data.s1[, "CountInput_v2"] != -1), ]

source("./r_scripts/data_read.r")
data.s1.SATD <- data.s1[(data.s1[, "CountInput_v1"] != -1), ]
data.s1_s2.SATD <- data.s1[(data.s1[, "CountInput_v1"] != -1 & data.s1[, "CountInput_v2"] != -1), ]
```

# Results
```{r}
summary(data.s1.non_SATD[,c("Project")])
summary(data.s1_s2.non_SATD[,c("Project")])

summary(data.s1.SATD[,c("Project")])
summary(data.s1_s2.SATD[,c("Project")])
```
